p: The MTT assay carried out to determine the cytotoxic effects of the various Opuntia stricta extracts on the U937 cell line showed that after 48hrs none of the extracts displayed cytotoxic effect. However, at concentrations of 100 and 200μg/ml, the acetone dried extract displayed some activities as indicated in Table 4 and Fig 11. The IC50 was 110.1 μg/ml ( Fig 12).
